page.title: 19The Sports Club: FINTRY
page.content:
The bequest of a part of a field next to the Endrick by Mrs Ruth Menzies led to the formation of{The Fintry Sports {and Recreation Club}in 1979. Donations came from{local residents, The Sports {Council}and{Stirling District Council.
Later the remaining part of the field was purchased and gifted to the club.
Anyone in West Stirlingshire may join. The members run it, with guidelines to protect Fintry community interests.
The facilities include - two{squash {courts, lounge, changing rooms, horse {riding}area,{rugby}&{football}pitches.
It is hoped to add a four-rink{indoor {bowling facility in 1986.
